--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> 
> "Hold on Myrmidon" hissed Hydras"Still we have to decide who will 
> control the puppet, I'm among Jhiaxus and you, but I wonder if you 
> Jhiaxus could hold your revenge will, at least a while... "

Myrmidon grunts and turns around to look at Hydras, his face hidden
from view by the shadows of his helm, but his optics are aglow with
impatience. However they quickly cool as Hydras' words penetrate
Myrmidon's focus. "I would think your servant Perceptor would be
controlling it?"  

> ::Jhiaxus::
> 
> Jhiaxus: I believe I could hold back my thirst for vengence knowing 
> that it will be all the better in the end.

"Fine. Jhiaxus will control it then." Myrmidon gestures at the exit.
"Perhaps I can leave now? I will radio as soon as I am in visual
range."

Preston
(Myrmidon)
